mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY (pNo, pWay, price, pDate) VALUES (#{pNo}, #{pWay}, #{price}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG I ON P.ITEM_NO = I.ITEM_NO WHERE P.ITEM_NO = #{itemNo}

SELECT M.GROUP_ID, M.USERID, M.USERNAME, O.ZIPCODE, M.ADDRESS, M.PHONE, M.POINT, C.COUPON_NAME, C.DISCOUNT_AMOUNT FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN ORDER_LIST O ON O.USERID = M.USERID INNER JOIN COUPON C ON M.USERID = C.USERID AND C.IS_USED = 'N' WHERE M.USERID = #{userId}
SELECT P.ITEM_NO, P.ITEM_NAME, P.PRICE, I.FILEPATH FROM product P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG I ON P.ITEM_NO = I.ITEM_NO
